Dependency=ASHRAE IECC Climate Zone 2004: # Description: The magnitude of cooling setpoint offset.
# Source: Constructed using U.S. EIA 2020 Residential Energy Consumption Survey (RECS) microdata.

# Assumption: For dependency conditions with low samples, the following lumpings are used in progressive order until there are enough samples: 1) lumping buildings into Single-Family and Multi-Family only,  2) lumping buildings into Single-Family and Multi-Family only and lumping nearby climate zones within  A/B regions and separately 7AK and 8AK 3) lumping all building types together and lumping climate zones within A/B and separately 7AK and 8AK regions
